title: The Draghi report on EU competitiveness
snippet: Mario Draghi – former European Central Bank President and one of Europe's great economic minds – was tasked by the European Commission to prepare a report of his personal vision on the future of European competitiveness.

title: Mario Draghi | CEPR
snippet: He served as President of the European Central Bank (ECB) from 2011 to 2019, where he played a pivotal role in navigating the Eurozone through the sovereign debt crisis. title: EU’s Most Influential Economic Policy-maker: Mario Draghi at the European Central Bank | European Journal of International Law | Oxford Academic
snippet: This article assesses the legacy of Mario Draghi as president of the European Central Bank (ECB) from 2011 to 2019, with particular reference to the Greek’s sovereign debt crisis.

title: Mario Draghi | Biography, Prime Minister, & Facts | Britannica
